text: Martin Dodd is a Danish-born music executive. Dodd is a former Sony Music International senior VP of worldwide A&R.; ==Early life== ==Career== Dodd began as a 17-year-old in the Danish label Mega Records. Here he worked himself up until his first in 1990 signed a contract with Ace of Base, which sold over 30 million records.
